page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: BUNGALOWS_Single story buildings about 30% of the homes in this area are occupied mostly by retired people. they play golf, tend their gardens, enjoy coach trips to nearby areas, though many become withdrawn.A mordern semi_detached bungalow costs about Â£35,000. Older houses;_ many dating from 17th century, several thatched_ inhabited by retired people who have lived and worked in the area all their lives _ many of these homes are neglected and in need of repair. Some of the older homes are occupied by people who have moved to the west country from London and the north as a preferable place to live and work.Some are occupied as holiday homes for use only during a few weeks of the year.The price of these older properties reflects the demand and they are becoming very expensive.
